titles.title: Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 1429) to reauthorize the Head Start Act, to improve program quality, to expand access, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 1429) to reauthorize the Head Start Act, to improve program quality, to expand access, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-440, by Ms. Castor.
All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 153.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 813.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 224 - 190 (Roll no. 1086).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Waives points of order against consideration of the conference report on H.R. 1429 (Head Start for School Readiness Act).
